author: publisher12
title: BARC Recruitment 2017 – Walk in for MO, GDMO & Statistician Posts
text: Click here for Statistician Post Details BARC Recruitment 2017 – Walk in for MO, GDMO Posts: Bhabha Atomic Research Center (BARC) Hospital has given a notification for the recruitment of Part-Time General Duty Medical Officer, General Duty Medical Officer, Medical Officer vacancies on adhoc/ locum basis. Eligible candidates may walk in interview on 06-01-2017 at 10:30 hrs. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process and how to apply are given below… BARC Vacancy Details: 1. Part-Time General Duty Medical Officer : 02 Posts 2. General Duty Medical Officer: 02 Posts 3. Medical Officer (Obst. & Gynaec.): 4. Medical Officer (Paediatrics): 01 Post Age Limit: Candidates age limit should be not more than 50 years as on 01-01-2017. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess MBBS from recognized University for Post 01, 02, MS/ MD/ DNB (Gynaecology) for Post 03, MD/ DNB (Paediatrics) or Equivalent or MBBS with relevant P.G.Diploma for Post 04 with relevant experience. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may walk in interview along with original certificates (SLC, SSC, HSC, Degree, Internship, PG Degree, year wise Mark-sheets) of educational qualification, Registration and experience and one set of attested copies of certificates and one passport size photographs on 06-01-2017 at 10:30 hrs. Venue details are mentioned below. Important Dates: Date & Time of Interview: 06-01-2017 at 10:30 hrs Reporting Time: 08:00 hrs Venue: Conference Room, 1st Floor, BARC Hospital, Anushaktinagar, Mumbai 400 094. For more details like experience, honorarium, Incidental Expenditure and other information click on the link given below link… BARC Recruitment 2017
